author: newsr.in
title: Katy Perry falling off a Segway and 14 or Instagrams that capture the wonder of Burning Man 2015
text: FEATURE: Yes, it’s very hip at the moment to dump on Burning Man, and fret that tech companies are killing the art festival. Or make jokes about building a wall around the Bay Area to keep Burners out. Whatever. Hate all you want. There is nothing like Burning Man. Nothing. And while we were getting a trickle […] »
